mapper.sql: ${tableName}.id as feed_id , ${tableName}.title as feed_title , ${tableName}.description as feed_description , ${tableName}.url as feed_url , ${tableName}.feed_url as feed_feed_url , ${tableName}.feed_type as feed_type , ${tableName}.icon as feed_icon , ${tableName}.image as feed_image , ${tableName}.favicon as feed_favicon , ${tableName}.created_at as feed_created_at , ${tableName}.updated_at as feed_updated_at
mapper.select:
select
from feed f order by f.id

select
from feed f where f.feed_url = #{feedUrl}

select f.id as unread_feed_feed_id , count(1) as unread_feed_unread_count , from user_item ui join item i on (i.id = ui.item_id) join feed f on (f.id = i.feed_id) where ui.user_id = #{userId} and ui.unread = 1 group by f.id order by count(1) desc
